In addition, there is the strong likelihood of the concert
of the Schubert and Mendelssohn piano trios being placed in this
Season, either in April or .late May/early June. The performers
will be Arthur Grumiaux, Pierre Fournier and Nikita Magaloff, the
probable place Chateau de Chillon, Switzerland and the estimated
cost 30,000 Swiss Francs.
Note:
Colin Davis is enthusiastic about doing Stravinsky's
complete "Pulcinella" and Mozart's "Thamos", but does not
want to conduct an orchestra with which he is not working in
any case.
This question will be discussed by the Heads of Music
during their meeting on the eve of the Committee's first session.
In any event it is now clear that the concert will not take
place during the 1971/72 Season.
